content: alva is an icelandic inspired sweater knitted with the icelandic yarn alafoss lopi it only comes in size 3 years for now but i might add other sizes later yarn usage color 1 about 200 g main color 9959 indigo color 2 under 50 g contrasting color 0008 light denim heather color 3 about 100 g contrasting color 0051 white
